site_name: Plot 18 Aylesbury EstateLand Bounded By Albany RoadPortland StreetWestmoreland Road And Bradenham CloseLondon SE17
description: Discharge of Schedule 3, Clause 19.5 'Updates to the Pedestrian and Cycle Delivery Plan to reflect variations or amendments to the approved plan', in respect of Plot 18 specifically, of the Section 106 Agreement attached to outline planning permission 14/AP/3844 [Approval date: 05.08.2015], the reserved matters for which were approved by 16/AP/2800 [Approval date: 09.12.2016] and subsequently varied by minor material amendment application 17/AP/3846 [Approval date: 14.02.2019]. The development description for 14/AP/3844 read as follows:"Outline application for: demolition of existing buildings and phased redevelopment to provide a mixed use development comprising a number of buildings ranging between  2 to 20 storeys in height (12.45m - 68.85m AOD) with capacity for up to 2,745 residential units (Class C3),up to 2,500sqm of employment use (Class B1); up to 500sqm of retail space (Class A1); 3,100 to 4,750sqm of community use; medical centre and early years facility (Class D1); in addition to up to 3,000sqm flexible retail use (Class A1/A3/A4) or workspace use (Class B1); new landscaping; parks, public realm; energy centre; gas pressure reduction station; up to 1,098 car parking spaces; cycle parking; landscaping and associated works. The application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement pursuant to the Town and Country Planning Regulations (Environmental Impact Assessment) 2011".
